issue.title: [Go] Array equality
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4972](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4972). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4972?focusedCommentId=16856501) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
to properly implement https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5493, there is a need for comparing Records and thus Arrays.

I might dedicate a few cycles to tackle this.

do you mind if I assign this issue to me?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4972?focusedCommentId=16857090) by Alexandre Crayssac (alexandreyc):*
No no, feel free to go ahead.

I have some work in progress in my source tree, I can push it if you want.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4972?focusedCommentId=16857463) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
> I have some work in progress in my source tree, I can push it if you want.

 

that wouldn't hurt, thanks :)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4972?focusedCommentId=16863233) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4541
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4541>
